thread.title: McMaster named Trump's national security adviser
thread.title_full: McMaster named Trump's national security adviser

author: AP
title: McMaster named Trump's national security adviser
text: McMaster named Trump's national security adviser President Donald Trump selected Army Lt. Gen. H.R. McMaster as his new national security adviser. Trump announced the pick Monday at his Palm Beach club. (Feb. 20) Post to Facebook McMaster named Trump's national security adviser President Donald Trump selected Army Lt. Gen. H.R. McMaster as his new national security adviser. Trump announced the pick Monday at his Palm Beach club.
